description: The base schema provides a starting point for all documents, is the default schema for all documents and is the schema used for metadata.
$comment: This keyword is reserved for comments from schema authors to readers or maintainers of the schema.
title: Base Schema Version 2018-03-01

___errors.description: The errors collection for when the response code is 4xx.

___href.description: Identifier and hyperlink to this resource.

___operations.description: The hypermedia as the engine of application state (HATEOAS) information.

___template.description: For relational database systems to save the template separate from the identifier.

___alternates.description: An array for providing hyperlinks to alternative representations for this resource.

___schema.description: Provides the self documentating feature for the resource / representation. Analogous to the 'describedby' relation type from RFC 5988 Web Linking

___relatedDataLinks.description: An array for providing hyperlinks to related data in a parent response.

___id.description: For relational database systems to save the identifier separate from the URI template. When combined with the `template` key results in the href key value. Suggest URL Encoded UUID4 value (aka GUID).

___relatedData.description: An array for embedding related data in a parent response.
